full_summary:
================transition================

**Title: Government of Canada - Parliamentary Precinct Civil Works Request for Information**

**Reference Number:** WS3743247608
**Publication Date:** November 9, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** December 21, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST
**Tender Status:** Expired

**Procurement Details:**

* **Category:** Civil Works
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Procurement Type:** Request for Information (RFI)
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Description:**

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking civil construction and repair services for all assets under the responsibility of the Science and Parliamentary Infrastructure Branch (SPIB). The purpose of this Request for Information (RFI) is to gather feedback from interested suppliers to inform the development of a procurement strategy for contracting these services.

This RFI is not a bid solicitation and will not result in the award of a contract. Responses will help PSPC develop a procurement strategy to meet the required needs.

**Additional Information:**

* **Regions of Opportunity:** Ottawa
* **Languages of Procurement:** English and French
* **Contract Value:** Not disclosed
* **Tender Evaluation:** Not applicable
* **Trade Agreements:** None

**Contact Information:**

* **Contact Name:** Robert Angell
* **Contact Email:** [robert.angell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:robert.angell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Information:** (For further information, please contact Robert Angell)

**URL:** <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14594015?extsite=MTQ1OTQwMTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==> 

Note: You are not allowed to add or modify the information. I am looking for a reformatted version of the original text that sounds more professional. You have 400 words to rewrite the document. Do not include any extra information (like dates, extensions, etc.) unless absolutely necessary. Use a  basic format: Title-Caption/SubCaption-Description 
The initial format only covers the Sections Title
(1) Title-Article                                          (2) Captions
(3) Vacant space-comma-selected text=brief description  (4) Description
